page.title: 12Sport & Leisure-Dorking NE
page.content: There are at least{6 large grass {sports fields}in this area.On these grounds football,rugby,cricket stoolball and athletics are played as team games by clubs and schools. When we asked some people about their{leisure time}they said that they used it in this{wide variety}of ways. They played:-bowls,badminton,squash, snooker,tennis,table tennis,netball, and basket ball. They rode,read,gardened,swam,fished ,walked,made jig-saws,drove ,went to the pub for a social drink and helped the over sixties in their homes. Some also practice judo,clay-pigeon shooting,motor-bike racing and country dancing. Some people belonged to sporting or farming clubs. Nobody mentioned {television viewing!
